WorkItem.Description:
Steps I use to reproduce:
1) Start Rawr b14
2) Set Rawr to Bear mode.
3) Load myself (feral druid) from file.
4) Select "Gear > Main hand" in the chart.
5) Load new character from armory, and then loading a protwarrior.
6) The charts of the weapons are not aligned. They still show the feral staves, but the red blue and green fields overlap and doesn't start at zero in the chart.
Â 
And a minor bug:
When using the "Load from Armory" the region drop down list is incorrectly positioned in the tab order.

Comments.Message: After step 5 did you change the model to ProtWarr? Because if I do, the chart updates correctly.
No, I didn't change the model to ProtWarr. The point was not that it was good weapons for a warrior, or that the model was ok - but that it _looked_ broken.
